nl.esciencecenter.neon.input

Class InputHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.neon.input.InputHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jogamp.newt.event.KeyListener, com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseListener, com.jogamp.newt.event.NEWTEventListener, EventListener

    public class InputHandler
extends Object
implements com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseListener, com.jogamp.newt.event.KeyListener
    A singleton pattern generic Input event Handler for use in OpenGL applications. Currently handles only basic mouse events (left-click-drag, scrollwheel).
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  InputHandler.octants
      Octants are used to define a direction from which the viewer is looking at the scene, these are useful in Octrees.
